ModulePrefs.title: Delicious
ModulePrefs.description: This plugin imports bookmarks from any publically available Delicious user account. To configure, enter the Delicious account user name.
ModulePrefs.author: Eureka Framework

Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript"> eurekastreams.streamplugin.addUrlValidator("User Name", "feed", "", "", "Please enter a valid Delicious user name.", "function(value) { if(value=='') { return ''; } else { return 'http://feeds.delicious.com/v2/rss/' + value; }}");
eurekastreams.streamplugin.registerGetFeedCallback( "function() { return $wnd.gwt_getFormValue('feed'); }"); </script>
